subject: Judo
Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2012)
Muslims and Islam
Muslim Veiling
lead_paragraph: One of Saudi Arabia’s first female Olympic athletes will not be allowed to wear a hijab in the judo competition, which could jeopardize her participation in the Games.
snippet: One of Saudi Arabia’s first female Olympic athletes will not be allowed to wear a hijab in the judo competition, which could jeopardize her participation in the Games.
